name: Shri Shah khimchand Lakshamichand Deaf and Dumb school trust
briefDescription: We Shall Overcome One DayShah Khimchand Laxmichand Institute For The Deaf  welcomes you.2.	The Trust was started in 1960 through collective efforts of a few young men of Darbargadh Ward Navjavan Sangh and the guardians of hearing impaired children. The late Prime Minister of India Smt. Indira Gandhi, laid the foundation stone of the modern building which is specially designed on the pattern of Royal National Institute For The Deaf and the famous architect Shri Dhansukhbhai Bhatt built a very beautiful building using red carved out stones and created an appropriate ambience with zigzag corridors to suit the childrenâ€™s curiosity and nature.		The classrooms look like nests as they are surrounded by flower plants, trees, crippers, greener
